name: Souls Tower
description:
This game is a prototype of a tower defense mix with bullet hell

The goal is simple, get to round 20 without dying. To help you destroy the enemies you will have turrets to place intelligently while avoiding enemy projectiles !

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The controls are simple

W/A/S/D to move (you change it)

TAB to open the BUILD window

Left mouse to place a tower

Right mouse to cancel

Echap for settings
